mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer, startdate, enddate, language, flag) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{language}, #{flag})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, startdate, enddate, viewcnt, replycnt, language, flag from tbl_board where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, startDate=#{startdate}, enddate=#{enddate}, language=#{language} where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, startdate, enddate, viewcnt, language, flag uname, uphoto from tbl_board, tbl_user where writer=uid and bno > 0 and flag=#{flag} order by bno desc, regdate desc
